• {{ brand.name }}
import { Component, NgIterable } from '@angular/core'; import { Brand } from '../brand'; import { BrandService } from '../services/brand/brand.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-backend-requests', templateUrl: './backend-requests.component.html', styleUrls: ['./backend-requests.component.css'] }) export class BackendRequestsComponent { brands: Brand[] = []; constructor(private brandService: BrandService) { } getBrands(): void{ this.brandService.getBrands() .subscribe(brands => this.brands = brands); } }
